iPhone XR Repair Services

MLG FIX offers a wide range of repair services for the iPhone XR. We can fix any of the following common faults:

🔧

Screen Repair

Broken or cracked screen? We replace iPhone XR screens with high-quality parts.

Get Started

🔋

Battery Replacement

Is your battery draining too fast or not holding a charge? We provide battery replacements for iPhone XR.

Get Started

💧

Water Damage Repair

Accidentally dropped your iPhone XR in water? We offer water damage repair services.

Get Started

🔊

Speaker Repair

Sound issues with your iPhone XR? We fix speaker problems and restore clear sound.

Get Started

🔌

Charging Port Repair

Having trouble charging your phone? We can replace or repair your iPhone XR's charging port.

Get Started
